page.title: 08Schools in Longfield
page.content: Schools in Longfield operate on the three tier_system. Children at five go to either Woodview First School or Sedley's,Southfleet (according to where they live) until they are nine. At nine they transfer to Longfield Middle School,where they remain until thirteen,unless they gain a place at 11+ in one of the Dartford grammar schools. At thirteen children move on either to Longfield Upper School or to the Gravesend grammar schools. They remain there until either sixteen or eighteen years of age. The buildings date from the 1960s,with some additional building erected during the 1980s.
